titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1694-1702 : William III)
William, III, King of England, 1650-1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Charles Bill, and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Guildhall, London.
"Given at our court at Kensington the three and twentieth day of January, 1697, in the ninth year of our reign."
Pertains to: An Act against corresponding with the late King James and his adherents.
